author.persName: Muhammad Qasim Hindu-Shah Astarabadi, known as Firishtah.

msItem.title: Tarikh i Firishtah, or Gulshan i Ibrahimi.
msItem.note: First flyleaf, recto. Impression of rectangular seal of Thakar? Parshad dated 123?4 and regnal year 12? Needs checking. Last folio, verso. Impression of the same seal. Inside front cover, printed slip: Lieut. Col. Briggs. The same work as Codrington/Reade No 61. Headings in red. Ruled margins. Illuminated initial opening.

bindingDesc.p: Red and brown leather Oriental binding with tooled and painted decoration.

origin.p: 2 Jumada I A.H. 1159, regnal year 29 of Muhammad Shah.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
